A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Like everyone else\, my feelings about The Last Jedi are complicated. This movie took chances and some of those chances landed and some didn't. But this is also a movie about making mistakes and recovering from those mistakes. For me\, the parts that didn't land were forgivable\, and the good parts took my breath away. I've seen it twice now and enjoyed it much more the second time. It's not a perfect movie\, by any stretch of the imagination\, but it's definitely worth seeing.
